subject: WSP IT Incident Message -Bentley Entitlements and ProjectWise Access
body:
To all Australian Users
Incident Message
Bentley licenses
System(s) or Service(s) Impacted
Bentley Entitlements and ProjectWise Access
Users Impacted
Bentley and ProjectWise Users
Impact Description
We have varied reports of staff unable to access Bentley licenses for some applications and Authentication to some Bentley Projectwise projects.
Teams are working with Bentley to identify and resolve what appears to be a varied result for staff.
Incident Opened
31/03/2025
10:00 AEDT
Next Update
31/03/2025
11:00 AEDT
Incident Number
INC1241769
Status
Ongoing
We apologize for any inconvenience this incident may have caused. An update will follow as soon as possible.
Thank you for your patience,
WSP IT
